definitions.definition: A catapult or other kind of war-engine.
Torture , originally as inflicted by an instrument of torture.
Any extreme pain, anguish or misery , either physical or mental .
examples: He was bitter from the torments of the divorce.

main_definition: ( obsolete ) A catapult or other kind of war-engine.
secondary_definitions: Torture , originally as inflicted by an instrument of torture.
Any extreme pain, anguish or misery , either physical or mental .
